name: Adapter Pattern (Cloud Native)
description: Normalizes interfaces of legacy or heterogeneous applications for modern system integration
when_to_use:
Legacy system integration
API normalization
Multi-vendor systems
Cloud migration preparation
benefits:
Legacy integration
Interface standardization
Incremental migration
Reduced coupling
drawbacks:
Translation complexity
Performance overhead
Maintenance burden
Debugging complexity
use_cases:
Legacy app modernization
Multi-cloud integration
API gateway adapters
Protocol converters

relationships.description: Adapter pattern is similar to anti-corruption layer
Adapter can be used during strangler fig migration
